title: 求助 游戏加载报错
author: zsdddd
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Tollainmear 于 2019-2-19 12:33 编辑 

求助   这是pcl报错的  用的是http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-812439-1-1.html的客户端

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// On the bright side, I bought you a teddy bear!

replies.author: Willam_Che
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

EnderIO: Found the following problem(s) with your installation:
                  * Optifine is installed. This is NOT supported.
这段是说末影借口不支持高清修复
Caused by: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Metaspace
这段是说内存溢出，你可以试试设置大点内存
